# Requirements Quality Checklist: Pay Conference Registration Fee

**Purpose**: Validate completeness, clarity, and consistency of UC-19 requirements for QA review
**Created**: 2026-02-06
**Feature**: /Users/chathilaratnatilake/Documents/University/WINTER 2026/ECE 493/ECE-493-CMS/specs/UC-19-pay-registration-fee/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all three user stories reflected in functional requirements? [Completeness, Spec §User Stories, Spec §FR-001..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK002 Are requirements defined for payment interface display and total fee? [Completeness, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK003 Are requirements defined for validating and sending payment details? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002..FR-003]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for recording confirmation and success message? [Completeness, Spec §FR-004..FR-005, Spec §FR-011]
- [ ] CHK005 Are requirements defined for invalid payment detail errors? [Completeness, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK006 Are requirements defined for decline handling and retry options? [Completeness, Spec §FR-007, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK007 Are requirements defined for service-unavailable messaging? [Completeness, Spec §FR-008, Spec §FR-010]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK008 Is the retry option after decline clearly scoped to corrected/new details? [Clarity, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK009 Is the service-unavailable message content explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-010]
- [ ] CHK010 Is the success confirmation content explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-011]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK011 Do edge cases align with functional requirements without contradictions? [Consistency, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-006..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK012 Do assumptions align with payment and registration type requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Assumptions, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK013 Are acceptance scenarios consistent with error/decline handling? [Consistency, Spec §Acceptance Scenarios, Spec §FR-006..FR-011]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK014 Are success criteria measurable and verifiable? [Acceptance Criteria, Spec §SC-001..SC-004]
- [ ] CHK015 Do success criteria map to requirements (process, record, errors)? [Traceability, Spec §SC-001..SC-004, Spec §FR-001..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK016 Are success criteria free of implementation details? [Clarity, Spec §SC-001..SC-004]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK017 Are primary payment flows fully covered by requirements and scenarios? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1, Spec §FR-001..FR-005]
- [ ] CHK018 Are invalid payment detail flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK019 Are declined and service-unavailable flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §FR-007..FR-010]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK020 Are edge cases written as explicit requirements or measurable outcomes, not just questions? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK021 Are response-time expectations specified for payment processing? [Gap, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK022 Are security/privacy requirements for payment data specified or intentionally out of scope? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK023 Are dependencies on pricing and registration type selection documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK024 Are assumptions about payment service availability documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
